text: CLOSE'Get Out'director Jordan Peele and star Daniel Kaluuya were in Palm Springs Jan. 3 for the Variety Brunch and had lots to say about each other and the Oscar nominated movie. Xochitl Pena / The Desert Sun'' Get Out'' Director Jordan Peele, left, and actor Daniel Kaluuya attend Variety's Creative Impact Awards and 10 Directors to Watch Brunch Red Carpet at the 29th annual Palm Springs International Film Festival in Palm Springs, Calif. ( Photo : Rich Fury / Getty Images ) I have friends who don ’ t understand the phenomenon of “ Get Out. ” They just don ’ t get it.
